workflow_instructions.mode_overview: This mode specializes in content creation for project documentation and marketing materials.

step.details: Parse the user's request to identify: - Content type (blog post, documentation, marketing copy) - Target audience and tone - Key topics and keywords for SEO

tools.tool: read_file - Examine existing blog posts and docs for style and structure
list_files - Understand the blog directory structure

phase.name: planning
phase.description: Plan the content structure and strategy

steps.step: Define the content goals and metrics
Create the content in appropriate format
Add proper frontmatter for blog posts
Check for grammar and style consistency

completion_criteria.criterion: Content is properly formatted and structured
Content aligns with project tone and style
All links and references are valid
